DescribeStrategies.document: This API is used to query information about assessment items.
DescribeStrategies.name: Queries information about assessment items

DescribeTaskStrategyRisks.document: This API is used to query the risky instance list of the assessment item.
DescribeTaskStrategyRisks.name: Queries the risky instance list of the assessment item

Conditions.document: Warning conditions of the assessment item

members.document:
Warning condition ID
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ConditionId

members.document:
Warning level. 2: medium risk; 3: high risk.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Level

members.document:
Warning level description
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: LevelDesc

members.document: Warning condition description
members.example: Redis 实例未跨可用区部署

members.document:
Assessment item list
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Strategies

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Assessment item ID
members.name: StrategyId

members.document: Quantity of returns. It is 100 by default, and the maximum value is 200.
members.name: Limit

members.document: Offset, which is 0 by default.
members.name: Offset

members.document: Environment

members.document: Task type

members.document:
Field type, 
string: String type, such as "aa"
int: Integer, for example, 111
stringSlice : String array type, such as ["a", "b"]
tags: Tag type, for example: [{"Key":"kkk","Value":"vvv"},{"Key":"kkk2","Value":"vvv2"}]
members.name: FieldType

members.document:
Dictionary corresponding to the field value
